explorer

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • explorer.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    The ship is the vessel player uses to travel from planet to planet. Stores gold pieces and also Item's in the inventory.

      Instantiates a new ship.
